Představte si že se jednoho dne nudíte a máte chuť zahrát si něco strašidelneho a najednou si vzpomenete na tuto hru. Rovnou vám řeknu že nic děsivého kromě komunity, bagů a mm zde nenajdete. A tak vám tady napíšu alespoň pár věcí proč tomuto kousku dát šanci.

1. Hrejte s přáteli. Pokud nemáte nikoho kdo by s váma hrál tak určitě surviora nehrajte. Teda pokud nechcete byt toxic svině které jde jen o to aby to killer leavnul. Nejvíce si hru užijete s full lobby ale k tomu potřebujte další 3 retardy, kteří si tuto hru koupí. Ve hře je totiž dost důležitá komunikace.(Pokud by jste je nemohli najít napište klidně si s váma zahraju :))

2. vyzkoušejte obě role killera i survivora. Ja hrával only surivora ale jednoho dne jsem si zkusil killera a velice jsem si užíval nahánět a killit bramboráky na 20. Ale bacha taky vám ten skvěly mm může dat survivory, kteří vám jen utíkají a blikají baterkama do ksichtu.

3. Snažte se nebýt toxic a nepohoršovat komunitu. Ano kumunita v DbD je skrz na skrz prochcana toxicitou obzvlášť vás naštvou killeři, kteří vás vytunelují takže si zahrajte tak 2 minuty. Potom jsou tady taky campeři a facecampeři, kteří dost dokážou zkazit hru. Ale je jedno co všechno vám udělají hlavně se nesnažte to potom taky ostatním takhle kazit a dělat ze sebe stejné kretény jako oni. Když vám tohle někdo udělá a naštve vás moc toho s ním nenaděláte. Můžete ho nahlásit napsat koment na profil a vynadat mu v četu. Avšak jediné co on udělá je že vám napíše CRY CRY CRYYYY.

Doufám že jsem alespoň trochu vyjádřil své pocity ze hry a ulehčil vám rozhodnutí jestli tento kousek koupit či ne. Ale to už je na vás. Tak či tak přeji vám hodně štěstí při loopovaní.

CRY! CRY! CRYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!

Игра в которой на низких рангах сурвы боятся маньяка.
Игра в которой на высоких рангах сурвы издеваются над маньяком.
Игра в которой тебя закемпят за то, что отмансил 3 генера.
Игра в которой обвинят в кемпе за то, что ты не даешь спасти при пяти взведенных генераторах.
Игра в которой сурвы требуют нерфа маньяков.
Игра в которой маньяки требуют нерфа SWF.
И наконец, игра в которой лучше скрывать свой профиль и не читать aftergame чат.
8/10 as a solo surv.
7/10 as a killer.
P.S: Слава Блендеткам!

The game is fun most of the time. My advise is to play with friends cause you are not always lucky with the randoms. Survivors that do not help you or do not work together, leading the killer towards you or just quit when caught. 
4 out of 10 killers i met used Face camping so if you are the first one caught, you are out of luck. They never win but it takes the fun out of the game. Other Killers do not hook the survivors but leave them. Match took a long time even with purple/green survivors so no complete noobs.

But it is fun. They should fix some bugs in this game instead of bringing new DLC's every couple of months. Fun task to level up survivors to rank3 lvl50. Suck at killer!

after putting in over 800+ hours i can say this game is dying like a clubbed baby seal. BHVR doesn't care about this project anymore they gave everything to killer mains and left to making a dating sim. when it released dead by daylight was balanced and both sides had enough pros and cons to level it out but with the ear bleeding amount of whining from killers the devs released this last patch to put the final bullet in this game's temple. game slast 1-2 minutes, everyone quits or self suicides on a hook. killers take absolutly no skill to walk over and boop you once, the dev's don't care about the ocean of hackers now joing like call of duty it's just accepted. save your 10-$20 wait for the holiday where they just give it away every year. unless you want to play a game that proves a company just doesnt care what it puts out here ya go.

The game play is fun but the matchmaking repeatedly puts you against way higher ranks than it should. The worst part though is the grind. You need an insane amount of blood points to be able to play different builds on different characters. If you wanted things on survivors and killers and have variety you would need upwards in the billion range of blood points when you get 20-30k a match typically. I want to like this game more I really do but the grind wears on you once it becomes clear just how big of a grind it is.

Такого комьюнити не видел нигде. Разве что в доте что-то похожее, но там весь движ происходит в голосовом или игровом чате, а в дбд такого чата нет. Именно по этой причине всё веселье находится в комментариях под вашим профилем. Лучшая игра на свете, зашёл первый раз за два месяца, словил коммент полный хейта. Очень рекомендую как симулятор клоунов в вашем профиле)
its worth the money and it is a very good game and it is fun to play with friends

I like the game. It's a fun game. I like surviving, unless the killer camps hooks then they're a douchebag. But I like playing games, specifically games that don't involve The Pig. The Pig is a bit scary. So it the Shape. I like the Wraith though. The wraith is fun. Did you know he is much more terrifying when he is standing still? I found out that the hard way when he chose Insidious as a perk. That was pretty terrifying. Also, I like the Doctor. He is scary too, and I like playing him. His illusions are fun and make people real, real scared. I only wish that the game wouldn't be so rough in custom games and disconnect friends. If I want to kill them I wouldn't kill their connection to the lobby. However, I would absolutely destroy them with big Pyramid Daddy. He isn't my daddy though. I appreciate the game's subtle sound design though, and how I can hear Huntress's like an additional terror radius except it's impossible to read accurately because who knows how it actually functions, we certainly do not know. There is nothing short of chaos to be had though, and I appreciate the chaotic fun that comes when your friend jumps into a hole accidentally, and finds themselves right next to the killer in the basement and dies immediately. It matters not though, I was still the epic esports player that managed to find the hatch before the killer did. That's an MVP move we like to say here at HQ. Although the hatch may be a good mechanic there is a statistically high chance that The Blight will come out of no where and grab you after closing the hatch and ruining your chances of escape by a mere moment, letting you die right before you can leave the gate. It's a very, adrenaline anxiety inducing phenomena that makes me scream like a little girl in my Discord voice call. I love it though, I love screaming like a little girl. It reminds me that I am still humble as a human being. Thank you, Dead By Daylight, for giving my friends the adequate scaretacular experience we've all been wanting on the carnal level.

This game is absolute garbage and the developers don't give a shit about the community or the game. Ever since the latest changes to the game, nobody cares about actually playing fairly and trying to rank up, instead people are focusing on being toxic and it's ruined the game. Killers will tunnel a single player out of the game in ways that are so blatantly obvious (such as leaving a chase as soon as the last person they were hooked gets off hook, just so they can go kill them again. If you do happen to bring a perk that is meant to "prevent" killers from playing this way, they'll simply tunnel you straight through the perk regardless just because they are fucking assholes. Dead by Daylight has gone from a game that I'd recommend and was a lot of fun, to something that is absolute garbage and will not recommend until the developers do more.

eu comecei a jogar há poucos meses, é um jogo extremamente bugado e os devs se preocupam muito com coisas que não deveriam. porém, os bug fixes estão saindo mais rápido (pelo o que eu tô percebendo). meus amigos que compraram o jogo desistiram de jogar, eu como gosto e não tenho sido tão afetada por bugs continuo jogando como sobrevivente.

This game is horribly frustrating and poorly designed. Killers are allowed to body block and camp hooked survivors making for an easy win; perks between survivors and killers is very lopsided; periodic skill level resets means that highly expierenced players with pro-tier perks are forced into play with newbies and lower level players; blatant issues remain unresolved...if you enjoy games that are frustrating, go for it. For those who want to have fun, I wouldn't recommend this. Every game has elements that take away from some of the fun, this one just has far too many of those elements.
